quote_last: : Phone call from Lüding, very worked up, urging me to return at once and get in touch with Alois, who was equally worked up.
title: The Lost Honour of Katharina Blum
author: Heinrich Böll

quote_first: One meal is enough now, topped up with a glucose shot. Sleep is still 'black', completely unrefreshing. Last night I took a 16 mm. film of the first three hours, screened it this morning at the lab. The first true-horror movie. I looked like a half-animated corpse. Woke
title: The Voices of Time
author: JG Ballard
